Title: Werckmeister Harmonies
Writer: László Krasznahorkai (novel), László Krasznahorkai (screenplay), Béla Tarr (screenplay), Péter Dobai (additional dialogue), Gyuri Dósa Kiss (additional dialogue), György Fehér (additional dialogue)
Actors: Lars Rudolph, Peter Fitz, Hanna Schygulla, János Derzsi
Plot: This story takes place in a small town on the Hungarian Plain. In a provincial town, which is surrounded with nothing else but frost. It is bitterly cold weather - without snow. Even in ...
